speaker: LEONTES
text_entry: ACT III

speaker: LEONTES
text_entry: SCENE I. A sea-port in Sicilia.

speaker: LEONTES
text_entry: Enter CLEOMENES and DION

speaker: CLEOMENES
text_entry: The climate's delicate, the air most sweet,

speaker: CLEOMENES
text_entry: Fertile the isle, the temple much surpassing

speaker: CLEOMENES
text_entry: The common praise it bears.

speaker: DION
text_entry: I shall report,

speaker: DION
text_entry: For most it caught me, the celestial habits,

speaker: DION
text_entry: Methinks I so should term them, and the reverence

speaker: DION
text_entry: Of the grave wearers. O, the sacrifice!

speaker: DION
text_entry: How ceremonious, solemn and unearthly

speaker: DION
text_entry: It was i' the offering!

speaker: CLEOMENES
text_entry: But of all, the burst

speaker: CLEOMENES
text_entry: And the ear-deafening voice o' the oracle,

speaker: CLEOMENES
text_entry: Kin to Jove's thunder, so surprised my sense.

speaker: CLEOMENES
text_entry: That I was nothing.

speaker: DION
text_entry: If the event o' the journey

speaker: DION
text_entry: Prove as successful to the queen,--O be't so!--

speaker: DION
text_entry: As it hath been to us rare, pleasant, speedy,

speaker: DION
text_entry: The time is worth the use on't.

speaker: CLEOMENES
text_entry: Great Apollo

speaker: CLEOMENES
text_entry: Turn all to the best! These proclamations,

speaker: CLEOMENES
text_entry: So forcing faults upon Hermione,

speaker: CLEOMENES
text_entry: I little like.

speaker: DION
text_entry: The violent carriage of it

speaker: DION
text_entry: Will clear or end the business: when the oracle,

speaker: DION
text_entry: Thus by Apollo's great divine seal'd up,

speaker: DION
text_entry: Shall the contents discover, something rare

speaker: DION
text_entry: Even then will rush to knowledge. Go: fresh horses!

speaker: DION
text_entry: And gracious be the issue!

speaker: DION
text_entry: Exeunt
